trans-unit.source: Associates a source table with a table in a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>, and is implemented by the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> class, which is used in common by .NET Framework data providers.
The <xref:System.Data.ITableMapping> interface allows an inheriting class to implement a TableMapping class, which associates a data source column with a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> column.
For more information, see [DataAdapter DataTable and DataColumn Mappings](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings.md).
An application does not create an instance of the <xref:System.Data.ITableMapping> interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits <xref:System.Data.ITableMapping>.
Classes that inherit <xref:System.Data.ITableMapping> must implement the inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality.
For example, the <xref:System.Data.ITableMapping> interface defines the <xref:System.Data.ITableMapping.DataSetTable%2A> property.
In turn, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> class inherits this property, and also defines the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping.GetDataTableBySchemaAction%2A> method.
Gets the derived <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
A collection of data column mappings.
Gets or sets the case-insensitive name of the table within the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
The case-insensitive name of the table within the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
Gets or sets the case-sensitive name of the source table.
The case-sensitive name of the source table.
